title: Another new attempt
content:
Another new attempt
[又一个新尝试]
Yesterday afternoon, I received an email about a Trae-related campaign.
[昨天下午我收到一条关于 Trae 的活动邮件。]
The main idea was: by publishing content about the new version of Trae, there’s a chance to win some prizes.
[主要内容是发布关于 Trae 新版的讲解内容，就有可能赢得一些奖品。]
I originally planned to try it over the weekend, but on impulse, I ended up spending four hours that same evening working on it.
[本来打算周末再尝试，结果一冲动就当天晚上花了四个小时完成了。]
By the time I uploaded the video, it was already 1 a.m., and I was too excited to fall asleep.
[最后上传完视频时已经是凌晨一点，整个人因为亢奋而无法入睡。]
Later, I realized something felt off emotionally—I had shifted my focus.
[之后我觉察到情绪有些不对，自己的关注重点发生了偏移。]
The point should’ve been the experience of trying out the campaign, not obsessing over feedback or fantasizing about winning a prize.
[真正的重点应该是对这类活动的尝试，而不是纠结于视频投放后的反馈或幻想奖品。]
After that, I gradually pulled my attention back—and overall, it turned out to be a worthwhile attempt.
[后来我慢慢把注意力收了回来，总体来说，这是一次不错的尝试。]

sentences.text: Yesterday afternoon, I received an email about a Trae-related campaign.
昨天下午我收到一条关于 Trae 的活动邮件。
The main idea was: by publishing content about the new version of Trae, there’s a chance to win some prizes.
主要内容是发布关于 Trae 新版的讲解内容，就有可能赢得一些奖品。
I originally planned to try it over the weekend, but on impulse, I ended up spending four hours that same evening working on it.
本来打算周末再尝试，结果一冲动就当天晚上花了四个小时完成了。
By the time I uploaded the video, it was already 1 a.m., and I was too excited to fall asleep.
最后上传完视频时已经是凌晨一点，整个人因为亢奋而无法入睡。
Later, I realized something felt off emotionally—I had shifted my focus.
之后我觉察到情绪有些不对，自己的关注重点发生了偏移。
The point should’ve been the experience of trying out the campaign, not obsessing over feedback or fantasizing about winning a prize.
真正的重点应该是对这类活动的尝试，而不是纠结于视频投放后的反馈或幻想奖品。
After that, I gradually pulled my attention back—and overall, it turned out to be a worthwhile attempt.
后来我慢慢把注意力收了回来，总体来说，这是一次不错的尝试。
